GatewayNetwork.description: The network settings for a gateway.

properties.name: CidrBlock
properties.description: A unique IP address range to use for this network. These IP addresses should be in the form of a Classless Inter-Domain Routing (CIDR) block; for example, 10.0.0.0/16.

type.description: A unique IP address range to use for this network. These IP addresses should be in the form of a Classless Inter-Domain Routing (CIDR) block; for example, 10.0.0.0/16.

properties.name: Name
properties.description: The name of the network. This name is used to reference the network and must be unique among networks in this gateway.

type.description: The name of the network. This name is used to reference the network and must be unique among networks in this gateway.

properties.name: EgressCidrBlocks
properties.description: The range of IP addresses that contribute content or initiate output requests for flows communicating with this gateway. These IP addresses should be in the form of a Classless Inter-Domain Routing (CIDR) block; for example, 10.0.0.0/16.

type.description: The range of IP addresses that contribute content or initiate output requests for flows communicating with this gateway. These IP addresses should be in the form of a Classless Inter-Domain Routing (CIDR) block; for example, 10.0.0.0/16.

properties.name: Name
properties.description: The name of the gateway. This name can not be modified after the gateway is created.

type.description: The name of the gateway. This name can not be modified after the gateway is created.

properties.name: Networks
properties.description: The list of networks in the gateway.

type.description: The list of networks in the gateway.

properties.name: GatewayArn
properties.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the gateway.

type.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the gateway.

properties.name: GatewayState
properties.description: The current status of the gateway.

type.description: The current status of the gateway.
